ch0095_00_cattleya/0101_0701_01_10:
Good day, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
You’ve got a lot of nerve, keeping me
waiting this long, you know...
ch0095_00_cattleya/0101_0701_02_10:
Tee-hee! I’m only teasing.
I hope you have a lovely day today.
ch0095_00_cattleya/0601_0701_01_10:
Pasio is such a warm and comfortable
island, isn’t it? Quite amazing, really.
ch0095_00_cattleya/0601_0701_02_10:
You know, if I could have a new villa
built here, it would be just perfect.
ch0095_00_cattleya/0601_0701_03_10:
With my own villa, I could enjoy the city
and natural landscapes here at my leisure.
ch0095_00_cattleya/0601_0701_04_10:
You know what... I think I’ll consult
my butler, just in case.
ch0095_00_cattleya/0601_0702_01_10:
If I ever do build a villa here,
I’ll be sure to invite you.
ch0095_00_cattleya/0601_0702_02_10:
Hmm... For the interior, I’m picturing
royal red carpets and a collection of
art pieces from around the world.
ch0095_00_cattleya/0601_0702_03_10:
I can decorate with some of Reuniclus’s
favorite things as well. That way we can
both enjoy the space.
ch0095_00_cattleya/0602_0701_01_10:
A long time ago, my psychic abilities used to
manifest whenever I lost control of my emotions.
It caused trouble for the people around me...
ch0095_00_cattleya/0602_0701_02_10:
Nowadays, I feel much stronger and I’m
able to control those outbursts.
ch0095_00_cattleya/0602_0701_03_10: Back then, I was still so immature...
ch0095_00_cattleya/0602_0701_04_10:
But you know, I wouldn’t be the person
I am today if I hadn’t experienced those
things in my past.
ch0095_00_cattleya/0602_0702_01_10:
Changing something about yourself...
It’s not an easy task to accomplish,
by any means.
ch0095_00_cattleya/0602_0702_02_10:
But if there’s something you’d like to change
or improve, I’ll be rooting for you.
ch0095_00_cattleya/0602_0702_03_10: If I can do it...I’m certain you can, too.
ch0095_00_cattleya/0603_0701_01_10:
My Reuniclus likes to cause mischief
with her psychic abilities.
ch0095_00_cattleya/0603_0701_02_10:
Sometimes she moves the furniture around
in my room without telling me...
She does that quite a lot, actually.
ch0095_00_cattleya/0603_0701_03_10:
I’d love to be able to rearrange my
furniture with mysterious psychic powers.
ch0095_00_cattleya/0603_0702_01_10:
Although, every time I try to rearrange
my furniture or clean my room myself,
my butler puts a stop to it.
ch0095_00_cattleya/0603_0702_02_10:
He insists that me trying to clean is no
different from my Reuniclus causing mischief...
Can you believe that?
ch0095_00_cattleya/0604_0701_01_10:
When I couldn’t fall asleep at night,
my Gothitelle used to use her mysterious
powers to create beautiful starry skies for me.
ch0095_00_cattleya/0604_0701_02_10:
It was like having my own planetarium
in my bedroom... Such precious memories.
ch0095_00_cattleya/0604_0701_03_10:
Every moment I’m with my Pokémon
is another beautiful memory. I gain
more and more of them each day.
ch0095_00_cattleya/0604_0702_01_10:
I think we overdid it a little bit that night we
created enough starry sky to cover the
largest room in the manor.
ch0095_00_cattleya/0604_0702_02_10:
My butler smiled when he saw it,
but I’m quite sure he was shocked
by the entire matter.
ch0095_00_cattleya/0604_0702_03_10:
Gothitelle and I immediately returned the
room to its previous state, but that was
sort of fun in a way, too.
ch0095_00_cattleya/0605_0701_01_10:
I haven’t yet reached what I would
call my perfect self.
ch0095_00_cattleya/0605_0701_02_10:
But someday I will fulfill that dream...
I’ll become the most elegant and most
graceful and refined Trainer of all.
ch0095_00_cattleya/0605_0701_03_10: And when I do, I’d like you to witness it.
ch0095_00_cattleya/0605_0702_01_10:
If you have a goal in mind and it’s
in my power to help you achieve it,
I’m more than happy to lend a hand.
ch0095_00_cattleya/0605_0702_02_10:
But triumphing over the final hurdle
is something you must do with your
own strength...
ch0095_00_cattleya/0605_0702_03_10:
Grasp onto victory with your own two hands,
or it will fall apart before you know it.
ch0095_00_cattleya/1701_0701_01_10:
Do you have a moment?
I have something nice I’d like to give you.
ch0095_00_cattleya/1701_0701_02_10:
It’s something I think you should have...
I hope you find it useful.
ch0095_00_cattleya/1701_0702_01_10: Reuniclus often finds items like these for me.
ch0095_00_cattleya/1701_0702_02_10:
She has a keen eye—notices things
much more quickly than I do.
ch0095_00_cattleya/2501_0701_01_10:
Where do you think you’re going?
Are you just going to abandon me here?
ch0095_00_cattleya/2501_0701_02_10:
I was hoping you and I could have a
Pokémon battle...
ch0095_00_cattleya/2501_0701_03_10:
Tee-hee! I’m only teasing.
I just love seeing that confused
look on your face.
ch0095_00_cattleya/2501_0702_01_10:
I wasn’t lying when I said I wanted
to battle with you, you know.
ch0095_00_cattleya/2501_0702_02_10:
But I also want you to face all sorts
of other Trainers first. I’d like to see
just how strong you can become.
ch0095_00_cattleya/2501_0702_03_10:
When the day comes and you’re ready, I’d like
for you and I to have a grand battle...
Is that too much to ask? Am I being selfish?
ch0095_00_cattleya/2511_0701_01_10:
I’ve noticed that my mood tends to swing in
a certain direction whenever I’m around you.
ch0095_00_cattleya/2511_0701_02_10:
Oh! But I’m not talking about mood swings
in the wild, uncontrollable sense.
Perhaps that wasn’t the proper word to use.
ch0095_00_cattleya/2511_0701_03_10:
It’s more like...when I’m around you,
I find it easier to express how I’m
feeling to other people and Pokémon.
ch0095_00_cattleya/2511_0702_01_10:
Sometimes, considering other people’s
feelings can actually make you a stronger
person yourself, huh.
ch0095_00_cattleya/2511_0702_02_10:
I’m not sure I would have ever realized
that on my own had I not met you.
ch0095_00_cattleya/3001_0701_01_10:
My, you’re awfully energetic in the morning!
Could that be the secret to your strength?
ch0095_00_cattleya/3002_0701_01_10:
What a calm and refreshing morning.
I think today will be a good day.
ch0095_00_cattleya/3003_0701_01_10:
Hello there. I’m so bored, I’m falling asleep...
Perhaps I’m in need of a Pokémon battle or two.
ch0095_00_cattleya/3004_0701_01_10:
Good day. Wonderful weather, isn’t it?
I was just contemplating heading out for a walk.
ch0095_00_cattleya/3005_0701_01_10:
Good evening.
The day goes by so fast, doesn’t it? Once you’ve
finished everything, you should rest, too.
ch0095_00_cattleya/3006_0701_01_10:
Oh my, is it dark already?
Don’t push yourself too hard.
